scripts.build: npm run build1 && cp build/out/out.js.map tmp/out.js.map-2.6.1 && npm run build2 && cp build/out/out.js.map tmp/out.js.map-2.4.16 && node dump-mappings.js tmp/out.js.map-2.6.1 && node dump-mappings tmp/out.js.map-2.4.16
scripts.build2: grunt clean concat && node save-sources.js && uglifyjs --mangle --source-map-url=out.js.map --in-source-map=build/out/out.js.map --source-map-include-sources --preamble="/* awww yisss */" --source-map=build/out/out.js.map --output=build/out/out.js build/out/out.js && node write-sources.js
